attributes.action: ask the Secretary of State to grant exemption for 3 Owls Bird Sanctuary and stop it's closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Three Owls Bird Sanctuary in Norden, Rochdale, opened in 1962 but after complaints from an "animal rights organisation", council officers found it was breaching zoo licensing legislation.

The sanctury takes in sick and injured birds from all over the country and uses guided tours each Sunday to help fund it's charitable work.

Having to meet legislation in order to meet the criteria for a zoo is forcing this sanctuary to close, but the Secretary of State has powers to make "small zoos" exempt.
